Text: THANKS pst Thank you all for coming to lunch please stay in touch and enjoy your afternoon I will be in Portland through the th of May Susan hm cell could one of you forward this onto Anna I dont have her email

RE Saturdaypst FYI it was Rons Birthday on Thursday May nd He will be there too Susan Original Message From Thompson Virginia Sent Thursday May PM To Oh John Rance Susan Gang Lisa Bruce James Richter Jeff Dunton Heather Cc Meyer Jim Subject Saturday Importance Low Hello all Here is the final wrap on Jeffreys Suprise Birthday party We are going to meet up at the Willamette Athletic Club in the Cafe between pm this Saturday Elaine at the front desk knows what we are doing just tell her that you are there for Jeffrey Ohs thing and she will show you where to go Jeff and I will be there at about Jeffrey thinks that we are meeting his brother John and one other friend there to go to Who Song If possible please park closer to Who Song and Larrys especially if Jeffrey knows what your car looks like dont want him to wonder why all his friends are at the athletic club After the cafe we will head over to Who Song and Larrys some time around ish for those who cant make it earlier Call me if you need anything at all My cell is I look forward to seeing you all there Thanks for helping me pull this off If you havent RSVPd please shoot me an email so I have an idea of how many are comming Thanks again Virginia DATE Saturday May TIME pm Jeff and I will be there around pm PLACE Willamette Athletic Club SW Landing Drive Portland phone OTHER If you cant make it to the club cafe please join us after or pm at Who Song and Larrys across the street Map to Willamette Athletic Club Call me if you need better details Its a little complicated to find the first time pypmappyPytTypaddrSWLandingDrcityPortlandstateORsltslnnameWillametteAthleticClubzipcountryusBFCatBFClientmagdesccsnewmagdsn

Mike Jackies flowers pst To all I just ordered flowers to be sent to Mike and Jackie Purcell who just recently had a miscarriage If you would like to donate to the expense of feel free to do so The card on the flowers says Thinking of you from all of us at the Enron Estate Thanks Susan

West Linn Power Company ISDA request Cc Legal Per the request of John Malowney please prepare an ISDA between Enron North America and West Linn Paper Company Kortney Brown or myself are you credit contacts Please note that all deals done with this counterparty need to be fully secured Thanks Susan
Power Exposure Report cob Attached in the Power Exposure Report for

Final Williams and Dynegy clean assignments Cc credit Here is the final purposed clean assignments with Williams and Dynegy The NET result will be and elimination of MM Williams risk ONLY if Williams will accept MM of Dynegy Risk Susan Tracy

RE SPs downgrade of Enron to Junk Status BPST My first link didnt work Original Message From Rance Susan Sent Wednesday November AM To DLPortland World Trade Center Quinn Kristin Dalia Minal Stewart Jennifer N Heu Mog Subject SPs downgrade of Enron to Junk Status B See attached file File Nov Enrons Rating Cut to B Doubt Cast on Dynegy Mergerhtm
SPs downgrade of Enron to Junk Status BPST See attached file

Contract Termination Cc that A counterparty that wants to terminate a contract needs to send a letter of termination via fax to The termination letter needs to include List of contracts being terminated Calculation of termination payment Expectation of payments if applicable A counterparty that unwinds deals does not mean a contract its null and void the counterparty is still liable for the existing deals governed by the contract Please forward this on to anyone who needs this information Thanks Susan

West Linn Power Company ISDA request Cc Legal Per the request of John Malowney please prepare an ISDA between Enron North America and West Linn Paper Company Kortney Brown or myself are you credit contacts Please note that all deals done with this counterparty need to be fully secured Thanks Susan

PUD No of Grays Harbor ISDA requestLegal Per the request of Stewart Rosman please prepare an ISDA between Public Utility District Number One of Grays Harbor and ENA Credit concerns should be addressed to Tracy Ngo or myself Thank you Susan

FW URGENTgang initiation info please readForwarded by Susan RanceNAEnron on PM From Sara Weaver EES AM To Analysts Michelle ES Brooklyn ES Amanda ES Anate ES Sonia ES Dulle Kate Judy ES Ana ES cc Subject FW URGENTgang initiation info please read Forwarded by Sara WeaverHOUEES on AM Cathy Pham AM To Sara ES Sonia ES Quyen ES cc Subject FW URGENTgang initiation info please read IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR SAFETY FROM THE DIRECTOR OF TRAINING AT THE US ARMYMILITARY POLICE SCHOOL PLEASE TAKE TIME TO READ AND PASS ALONG A friend stopped at a payatthepump gas station to get gas Once she filled her gas tank after paying at the pump and started to leave the attendant inside came over the speaker He told her that something happened with her card and that she needed to come inside to pay The lady was confused because the transaction showed complete and approved She told him that and was getting ready to leave but the attendant once again urged her to come in to pay or else She proceeded to go inside and started arguing with the attendant about his threat He told her to calm down and listen carefully He told her that while she was pumping gas a guy slipped into the back seat of her car on the other side and he had called the police She immediately became scared and looked out there in time to see her car door open and the guy slip out The report is that the new gang initiation thing is to bring back a womans body part One way they are doing this is crawling under girlswomens cars while theyre pumping gas or at grocery stores in the night time Then they are cutting the ladys ankles to disable them in order to kidnap them kill and dismember them The other way is slipping into unattended cars and kidnapping the women to kill and dismember them Please pass this on to other women young and old alike BE extra careful going to and from your car at night If at all possible dont go alone This is real The message ALWAYS lock your car doors even if youre gone for just second Check underneath your car when approaching it for reentry and check in the back before getting in Always be aware of your surroundings and other individuals in your general vicinity particularly at night Send this to your friends so as many females as possible can be made aware of this new threat and so your friend will not be the next victim Thanks Barbara Baker Secretary Directorate of Training US Army Military Police School

FW New Midas FrontEndOriginal Message From Wolfe Stephen Sent Monday May PM To Barta Tammy Best Lisa Carey Brad Davis Angelic Dawson Brian K Doroteo Rufino East Laynie Fredericks Kristi Hardy Stacy Kang Lisa Lum Rosalyn Quirsfeld Amy Rance Susan Cc Miller Brad Spoede Amy Jolly Kevin Vakharia Adarsh Becton Pam Lamb Marnie Schwertner Brian Vargas Hope Subject New Midas FrontEnd Please find enclosed the final component of the Midas security enhancements This frontend is a fully executable file which means that you can save it to your hard drive or anywhere else and it will link over to the Midas databases You can also make a shortcut to place on your desktop or in your start menu The password to the old frontend will no longer function this application will be the only way to access Midas Your password will be your first initial and last name for example mine is swolfe Your password is your digit Enron extension feel free to change it Let me know if you have any questions Stephen
Jedi cashRufino and Lisa Dana will be doing cash while I am out Susan Rance Enron North America

Jedi CashDana Here what I think will work for cash Monday Susan Tuesday Susan Wednesday Both go over all instructions and inform Rufino Brad and Lisa Kang about you doing cash Thursday Dana Friday Dana Monday Dana Tuesday Dana Wednesday Dana Thursday My birthday Both I will be back in town we can go over stuff Friday Dana from here on out we should get the okay from managers etc in dept and see if this works out Let me know if you have any questions Hope you had a great weekend Susan Rance Enron North America

Wire InstructionsI complied all the wiring intrusions we use in the Merchant Finance Group it can be found OStfinAccntngWire InstructionsMI Wire InstructionsxlsSheet If changes need to be made please make them Thanks Susan Rance Enron North America

Midas AdditionMerchant Finance Group Stephen per my request added a feature on Midas to log the status of Merchant Investments It can be found in the Roll forward Database by clicking on the button on the lower righthand side labeled Log Entry My hope is that this feature will help everyone understand what is going on with investments since everyone investment is unique and involves many people Susan Rance Enron North America

RE Jedi deposityeah we will have to chat about it a bit later Original Message From Davis Dana Sent Thursday May AM To Rance Susan Subject RE Jedi deposit Did you find out about this deposit Original Message From Rance Susan Sent Wednesday May PM To Smith Stephanie King Lisa Barta Tammy Becton Pam Best Lisa Carey Brad Davis Angelic Davis Dana Dawson Brian K Doroteo Rufino East Laynie Fredericks Kristi Hardy Stacy Kang Lisa Lamb Marnie Lum Rosalyn Mendez Nicole Schwertner Brian Vargas Hope Wolfe Stephen Subject Jedi deposit Anybody know about a deposit into the Jedi bank account in the amount of yesterday Thanks Susan Rance Enron North America

REawesome Dana congratulations I know it will be a good change for you do you know anybody in the new group I still can not believe how much the group has changed since I have been there Crazy stuff Have a great last day in Merchant Finance Take care Susan Original Message From Davis Dana Sent Friday November AM To Rance Susan Subject RE Good Morning Sue Ive been out sick for days Im going to the Global Counter party group on the th Flr Yes I am very happy about no more wires and signatures Original Message From Rance Susan Sent Thursday November PM To Davis Dana Subject Dana Your last day it tomorrow Whoa I am happy for you where are you headed to Susan

Re Enron Kids Cc great do you know what time the bus picks up ect Dana would like to know also Susan From Nicole Mendez ECT PM To Susan NRON cc Subject Re Enron Kids Great I will put you down There will be bus transportation available for the sponsors Nicole
